app_description: Private Event Planner is an application designed for organizing private events intuitively. It allows users to create and manage events in an easy way. Events can be accessed only by direct link, generated on event creation. This provides a secure way of sharing events with others. In order to create event user must provide basic information about event and his email address. Email address is used to send editing link to user. Application also allows to export events to ICS format and to add them on google calendar.
create_event_success_message: Here are the links to access and manage the event. Keep managing link private, it cannot be changed. Links will be sent to your email address shortly.
image_upload_help: Select a new image to replace the current one.
no_universal_invitation_link_yet: No universal invitation link has been created yet.
no_personalized_invitations_yet: No personalized invitations have been created yet.
create_personalized_help_text: Create an invitation link for a specific person by name.
personalized_link_help_text: Share this link directly with the person
generic_invitation_help_text: Generate a link anyone can use to sign up for this event. (Only one generic link per event)
generic_link_share_help_text: Share this link. Users will enter their name and email to join.
confirm_delete_personalized_invitation: Are you sure you want to delete the invitation for "{{name}}"
confirm_delete_generic_invitation: Are you sure you want to delete this universal invitation link? It will no longer be usable.
load_event_details_unexpected_response_e: Could not load event details due to an unexpected response.
load_event_details_failed_error: Could not load event details for this invitation.
name_email_required_error: Please enter your name and email to join.
generic_invitation_accepted_alert:
Success! You have joined the event.

Your UUID is: 
{{uuid}}

IMPORTANT: Please save this UUID as it can only be accessed once. It will be needed to comment on the event.
load_personalized_failed_error: Could not load invitation details. It might be invalid or already accepted.
cannot_accept_details_not_loaded_error: Cannot accept invitation: Details not loaded.
your_email_required_error: Please enter your email to join.
accept_personalized_failed_error: Failed to accept invitation. It might be invalid or already used.
personalized_invitation_accepted_alert:
Success! You have joined the event as "{{name}}".

Your UUID is: 
{{uuid}}

IMPORTANT: Please save this UUID as it can only be accessed once. It will be needed to comment on the event.
invalid_or_used_personalized_invitation_: Invalid or used personalized invitation link.
